title: Client Relationship Management System
shortDesc: A full-stack CRM built with Django REST, React, and PostgreSQL to streamline lead tracking and real-time agent management.
longDesc:
**Problem:** Businesses struggle to efficiently track leads, assign work, and manage agents in real-time.

**Solution:** Built a role-based CRM platform with secure APIs, live lead tracking, and seamless frontend-backend integration using Django REST, React, and PostgreSQL.

**Impact:** Reduced lead assignment time by over 40% and improved organizational tracking efficiency.

**Features:** Role-based access, real-time dashboards, secure authentication, optimized database queries.

title: Real-Time Scene Graph Generation
shortDesc: A YOLOv5-based framework that generates semantic scene graphs at ~30 FPS for robotics, AR/VR, and surveillance.
longDesc:
**Problem:** Understanding real-time object relationships is computationally expensive, limiting use in robotics and AR/VR.

**Solution:** Developed a YOLOv5 + PAN-FPN + GloVe based model to detect objects and predict relationships with ROI Align and multi-scale feature fusion.

**Impact:** Achieved 14.5 mR@100 at 30 FPS, enabling integration in autonomous systems and real-time monitoring.

**Features:** Object detection, relation classification, spatial encoding, high FPS performance.

title: Continual Federated Learning for Speech Tasks (C-FLAG)
shortDesc: A privacy-preserving continual learning system for multilingual ASR using Whisper-Tiny in federated environments.
longDesc:
**Problem:** Federated ASR models often forget previous knowledge when trained on new data over time.

**Solution:** Created C-FLAG — a combination of gradient replay and aggregation methods — to adapt Whisper-Tiny for continual learning in multilingual ASR without centralizing speech data.

**Impact:** Retained up to 15% more accuracy compared to standard FL setups while reducing communication costs by 18%.

**Features:** Privacy-preserving continual learning, multilingual ASR, edge-device compatibility.
